name: Global Reporting Initiative (GRI) Standards
description: Provides a global standard for sustainability reporting covering economic, environmental, and social impacts.

name: MSCI ESG Ratings
description: Rates companies based on their exposure to long-term environmental, social, and governance risks and opportunities.

name: S&P Global Sustainability Yearbook
description: Highlights top-performing companies in global sustainability, providing detailed insights into sustainability practices.

name: CDP
description: Helps companies disclose their environmental impacts, focusing on greenhouse gas emissions, water management, and forest conservation.

name: SASB Standards
description: Provides industry-specific standards that help companies disclose financial material sustainability information to investors.

name: ISO 14001
description: International standard that specifies requirements for an effective environmental management system (EMS).

name: LEED
description: Certification program that recognizes best-in-class building strategies for green building and design.

name: BREEAM
description: Assesses the sustainability of buildings against a set of criteria to encourage a more sustainable environment.

name: Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi)
description: Enables companies to set ambitious emissions reductions targets to meet the goals of the Paris Agreement.

name: Dow Jones Sustainability Indices
description: Provides benchmarks for investors who want to reflect their sustainability convictions in their portfolios.

name: FTSE4Good Index Series
description: Designed to measure the performance of companies demonstrating strong ESG practices.

name: EcoVadis
description: Provides sustainability ratings for global supply chains, assessing companies on environment, labor practices, ethics, and sustainable procurement.

name: Carbon Footprint Calculator
description: Tool to calculate the carbon footprint of operations, useful in setting reduction goals and reporting.

name: Water Footprint Assessment Tool
description: Helps companies and individuals assess and report the water footprint of their activities or products.

name: Higg Index
description: Measures the environmental and social impacts of apparel and footwear products across the product lifecycle.
